title: Sound On: Vegas Politics, Selling Blue Checkmarks, Election Security
itunes:title: Sound On: Vegas Politics, Selling Blue Checkmarks, Election Security
description:
Joe spoke to the Dean of Nevada politics Jon Ralston, CEO of The Nevada Independent on the most watched races in the state, and Congressman Ted Lieu of California on election security and the attack on Speaker Pelosi's husband. Plus our politics panel, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino & Rick Davis on the Fed's rate hike, President Obama hitting the campaign trail in Nevada for vulnerable Democrat Catherine Cortez Masto, the White House deleting a tweet taking credit for a recent bump in social Security checks, President Biden's speech on election security and if the White House would pay $8 a month for the blue check on Twitter. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
